column1:
template <int N>
    struct Factorial 
    {
         enum { value = N * Factorial<N - 1>::value };
    };
 
    template <>
    struct Factorial<0> 
    {
        enum { value = 1 };
    };
 
    // Factorial<4>::value == 24
    // Factorial<0>::value == 1
    void foo()
    {
        int x = Factorial<4>::value; // == 24
        int y = Factorial<0>::value; // == 1
    }
